RawLine: ITEM_04118_Tip,將珍稀藥材磨成粉末加入酒中並放置醞釀數年而成的藥酒。需耗費大量時間與錢財，非富人高官可能連見都沒見過的高檔藥酒。{p}{p}種類：{color=#ff0000}藥酒{/color}{p}合成難度：{color=#ff0000}9{/color}。{p}{p}特殊功能：清除{color=#00DB00}中毒{/color}與{color=#00DB00}出血{/color}。,将珍稀药材磨成粉末加入酒中并放置酝酿数年而成的药酒。需耗费大量时间与钱财，非富人高官可能连见都没见过的高档药酒。{p}{p}种类：{color=#ff0000}药酒{/color}{p}合成难度：{color=#ff0000}9{/color}。{p}{p}特殊功能：清除{color=#00DB00}中毒{/color}与{color=#00DB00}出血{/color}。

Items.mt: A medicinal wine made by grinding rare herbs into the wine and leaving it to brew for several years. It takes a lot of time and money, and is a high-class medicinal wine that non-wealthy and high-ranking officials may not even have seen. It is a high grade medicinal liquor that requires a lot of time and money, and may not be seen by the rich and powerful.
